text: The 1954–55 season was the 47th year of football played by Dundee United, and covers the period from 1 July 1954 to 30 June 1955. United finished in thirteenth place in the Second Division. ==Match results== Dundee United played a total of 37 competitive matches during the 1954–55 season. ===Legend=== {| class="wikitable" |- |- bgcolor = "#d0ffe3" |Win |- bgcolor = "#f3f3f3" |Draw |- bgcolor = "#ffd0e3" |Loss |} All results are written with Dundee United's score first.
